author: dfraser
title: Leicester City, the stats that prove why Foxes are in utter free-fall… as they are down in EVERY key statistic this season
text:
EFL 'Fearless' no more Leicester City, the stats that prove why Foxes are in utter free-fall… as they are down in EVERY key statistic this season 
Claudio Ranieri's men are far worse of in attack and defence as they follow up Premier League title win with relegation battle Feature
